articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: More than 20 million in Britain get first COVID-19 vaccine dose - Reuters
articles.description: More than 20 million people across the United Kingdom have now received their first COVID-19 vaccine shot, data showed on Sunday as the country made more progress with Europe's fastest vaccination programme.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
